EmailTemplate.name: Case Creation Acknowledgement - D&S Order Changes
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We have received your request to change an existing order and have routed it to one of our customer service specialists for review. The case tracking number for this inquiry is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
To communicate further in regards to this inquiry, please reply to this e-mail with the Reference Case number in the subject line of the message.
If you did not include your Purchase Order with your original request, please respond directly to this email and attach your Purchase Order to your response.
Thank you. We appreciate your business! Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support.
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time.
